Almaz color update!

 

Tantares in colors still needs an update for the added bits to the almaz parts, but other than that, boy does this look pretty!

On 9/9/2018 at 5:50 PM, Beale said:

 

So I've also been looking for info on the meteor satellites, and unfortunately what's available online seems to be lacking. 

What I've gathered from Here is that the early version you're basing your model off of had a gyroscopic attitude control system as well as a gas based system for the first part of the mission.  Soooo my guess is that the Vostok upper stage situated the satellite into an orbit, and then the gas system refined the orbit and set the attitude with the gyroscopic system taking over for fine maneuvering.

This site gives us the much needed rear shot, though it's a bit grainy.  Also that apogee and perigee would be low Earth orbit, though that shouldn't stop anyone from sending their Meteor's to other planets in KSP

The Meteor also had sun tracking solar panels, so new solar panels!   Also, it had an umbrella looking antenna, so new folding antenna!

And lastly, I think this would look good on top of a Voskhod, let the Kerbals spy on those evil clouds!
Speaking of Meteor. This is just a mockup, of course, but...

1 minute ago, Dutchbook said:

What museum is that? Seems like a great place to visit when in Moscow

It's three museums, actually The Cosmonautics museum, the Cosmos pavilion at VDNKh and the Polytechnical museum next door from Cosmos (that's the one with cool lunar and martian base concepts). It's all in the tags, actually. As well as spacecraft type and name, I tried to make browsing this collection as convenient as possible

10 hours ago, Frednoeyes said:

Mine's probably not supposed to look like this is it?

Nope.
It's an outdated part, you need to reinstall Tantares via deleting the existing folder in /Gamedata to fix this.

I have a suggestion to make! Looking at images of the vostok spacecraft, I noticed these flaps around the retro rocket; these flaps were actually a thermal control system. I would like to suggest, therefore, that you add those into the game for a better vostok recreation. Besides, I think it would be nice to have an early game thermal control system, in case you send your vostok to moho or something.

Saw a progress 2, so I made one too!

Docked with MIR, dropping off snacks.
